divs: sighting details@ hwy 90 and gult city road going south veiwed triangular vehicle with three lights white in color, vehicle frame at night appeard black, direction south east on my left about a quarter @ arms lenghth vehicle move in the general direct of eglins air force base in fort walton florida. object move smooth as though it was gliding, at last veiwing object was 1\2 dime size and low in horizon and lost to trees. with renewed base activity this may be worth an extra look. when object was last seen all three lights on bottom and in corners could still be made out. i hope this report can be forwarded to a person southeast of me tonight as it appeared to be fixed in its path. mr cannon
Summary: veiwed while rideing motor cycle at night spotted vehicle at a steady pase
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Milton
